detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract CustomToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__15.sol#258-269) has payable functions:
	 - AirdropToken.airdrop() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__15.sol#232-246)
	 - CustomToken.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__15.sol#266-268)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [CustomToken](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__15.sol#L258-L269) has payable functions:
	 - [AirdropToken.airdrop()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__15.sol#L232-L246)
	 - [CustomToken.fallback()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__15.sol#L266-L268)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:
LockToken._transfer(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__15.sol#173-186) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < item.endtime && remain < item.remain (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__15.sol#180)

detectors.description:
AirdropToken.airdrop() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/CustomToken__15.sol#232-246) uses timestamp for comparisons
